code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import slide1 from"./assets/proudToDonate1.jpg";import slide2 from"./assets/proudToDonate2.jpg";import slide3 from"./assets/proudToDonate3.jpg";import styles from"./styles/proudToDonate.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProudToDonate=()=>{const x=[".myactive",".mynone"];const[proprety,setProperty]=useState(x);const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);let n=3;const setImage=()=>{let i=index;var current=[...proprety];current[i]=".mynone";i=(i+1)%n;current[i]=".myactive";setProperty(current);setIndex(i);};useEffect(()=>{const timer=setTimeout(setImage,3000);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(React.Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`col-11 m-auto ${styles.container}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:slide1,alt:"ProudToDonate1",className:proprety[0]===".myactive"?styles.myactive:styles.mynone}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:slide2,alt:"ProudToDonate2",className:proprety[1]===".myactive"?styles.myactive:styles.mynone}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:slide3,alt:"ProudToDonate3",className:proprety[2]===".myactive"?styles.myactive:styles.mynone}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`${styles.caption}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:" Proud to Donate"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`${styles.text}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more"})})]})});};export default ProudToDonate;
